text: There's a Girl in My Soup is a 1970 British romantic comedy movie directed by Roy Boulting and was based on the stage play of the same name. It stars Goldie Hawn, Peter Sellers, Tony Britton, Judy Campbell, Nicky Henson, Diana Dors, Oscar Quitak, Nicola Pagett, Gabrielle Drake, Thorley Walters, Christopher Cazenove and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1970 romantic comedy movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Roy Boulting Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Infidelity in movies Category:Movies about narcissism Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in London
title: There's a Girl in My Soup
